title: MCH2022: DNA and GPS/Galileo/GNSS Talks
summary:
(scroll down for my two talks if you are in a hurry)
As I write this I’m suffering from severe post-camp blues. Every four years the Dutch hacker community organizes a stupendously large multi-day campsite event, with ample international help. To a large extent, “everyone” is there. And this time, like every time, people who originally decided they could not make it.. show up by day two. Because the pull is just too strong.
